Package freenet.node.simulator

Class Summary
BootstrapPullTest Insert a random block of data to an established node via FCP, then bootstrap a newbie node and pull it from that.
BootstrapPushPullTest  
BootstrapSeedTest  
LongTermManySingleBlocksTest Insert 32x single blocks.
LongTermManySingleBlocksTest.InsertBatch  
LongTermMHKTest Simulates MHKs.
LongTermPushPullCHKTest Push / Pull test over long period of time Pushes N CHK's and records both their insert time and their CHKs.
LongTermPushPullTest Push / Pull test over long period of time
LongTermPushRepullTest Push / Pull test over long period of time Unlike LongTermPushPullTest, this only inserts one key per day.
RealNodeBusyNetworkTest Test a busy, bandwidth limited network.
RealNodeNetworkColoringTest Create a bunch of nodes Connect them into two or more s.w.
RealNodePingTest  
RealNodeRequestInsertTest  
RealNodeRoutingTest  
RealNodeSecretPingTest  
RealNodeTest Optional base class for RealNode*Test.
RealNodeULPRTest Create a key block with random key and contents.
